About

The goal of the Computing Resources Unit is to provide the best possible customer service, application development, and technology infrastructure to support the business needs of the Deanâ€™s Office and the College of Agricultural & Environmental Sciences and its departments.

Help Desk

Get an Account

This guide will explain how to get computing access with CAES Dean's Office.

Here are the forms to fill out and sign to request computing access in the CA&ES Dean's Office. Supervisors, please send the Computing Account Request form to computer support at support@caes.ucdavis.edu and we will process your account request. Please print out the Dean's Office Computing Policy Agreement and the CA&ES Information Security Policy, have the new employee sign them and send them to us via campus mail, drop off at 38 Mrak, or scan and email them to support@caes.ucdavis.edu. Please be sure to include the user's valid Kerberos ID.

Request Forms (supervisor)

  • Computing Account Request Form - Dean's Office [doc]

To be signed by the new user:

  • Deans Office Computing Policy Agreement [doc]
  • CA&ES Information Security Policy [doc] [pdf]
